title: A quick site refresh (and what’s next)
description: I made a big round of updates to the website this week — mostly focused on making it easier (and more fun) to explore my work, the people I’ve learned from, and the projects I’m excited about.

description: My website officially launched and is undergoing active remodeling. Stay tuned for updates.
